hack.name: Weapon EXP carries over on level up
hack.author: periwinkle

panel.field: Normally, when a weapon levels up, any exp in excess of the amount used to level up is discarded (the next level always starts at 0 exp). For example, if you are 1 exp away from leveling up and then collect a +20 crystal, you will only receive the 1 exp needed to level up and the remaining 19 exp will not be counted. This patch fixes that so that any extra exp will carry over into the next weapon level.
